categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Durik Vesh was a male Human Sith who served the resurgent Sith Empire and was stationed on the planet Voss. He tried to discover the secrets of the Nightmare Lands but went mad and was later captured by agents of the Republic Strategic Information Service. Discovering Durik's capture, the Empire sent an agent to kill him before he could recover and tell the Republic everything he knew. The agent succeeded in his mission, and Durik was eliminated.
